page.title: 14SCHOOLS
page.content: BUXTED SCHOOL On the 3rd July there were 56 boys and 56 girls in the school. Class 1 (29 children) ages 9-11 Class 2 (27 children) ages 8-9 Class 3 (28 children) ages 6-8 Class 4 (28 children) ages 4-6 There were 4.6 teachers including the headteacher. One secretary(12.5 hrs) 2 ancillary helpers (5 hrs a week). Three canteen workers including the cook.A teacher of French spends two hours a week with the older age group. We also employ out of the 4.6 a remedial teacher ffor one day a week. The school takes part in the local management scheme which means we hve a cheque book and pay our way out of an allowance that covers books, heating, some maintenance. Thus money we save on telephone calls can be spent on books.
